name: Reef One Biodegradable Flips - Men's
description: What's not to love about simple footwear that you can toss in the washing machine and biodegrades at the end of their useful life?Made of Eco-One biodegradable, injection molded EVA that uses no methane in its production.Anatomic contoured footbeds are made of soft cushioning EVA.Firm, non-marking EVA outsole.
